metrics.label: Code Champion

story.title: From Code Competitions to Enterprise Solutions
paragraphs: My journey started with competitive programming, where I became a 3-time national finalist in India's largest coding competition, ranking among the top 300 out of 250,000+ developers.

Over 8+ years, I've evolved from writing algorithms to architecting enterprise solutions that serve Fortune 500 companies. I've led technical teams, built products from inception to acquisition, and created systems that directly drive business revenue.
Today, I specialize in microservices architecture, AI integration, and blockchain solutions, helping companies scale their technology while building high-performing remote teams.
story.highlight: What drives me: Solving complex technical challenges that have measurable business impact, while mentoring teams and sharing knowledge through speaking and writing.

professional.label: Professional Work
professional.description: Enterprise solutions that drive business results

cybersecurity-platform.title: Enterprise Cybersecurity Platform
cybersecurity-platform.description: Single-handedly built backend serving 720+ CISOs across Fortune 500 companies, integrating AI for insights and automated reporting.
highlights: Built complete backend infrastructure serving Fortune 500 CISOs
Integrated OpenAI GPT for automated security insights
Achieved $M+ in enterprise contract renewals
Served 2,500+ users across multiple enterprises

ai-document-processing.title: AI Document Processing System
ai-document-processing.description: Orchestrated 11 ML models to process 1,000+ documents/night with 99% accuracy. System success led to formation of new company.
highlights: Orchestrated 11 different ML models in production pipeline
Achieved 99% accuracy in document classification and extraction
Processed 1,000+ documents nightly without manual intervention
Success led to spin-off company formation

code-generation-framework.title: Code Generation Framework
code-generation-framework.description: Created framework automating 75% of application development, enabling migration of 150+ legacy systems across 15+ teams.
highlights: Automated 75% of standard application development workflows
Enabled migration of 150+ legacy applications to modern stack
Adopted by 15+ development teams across the organization
Reduced development time by 60% for standard enterprise applications

portfolio-generator.title: Developer Portfolio Generator
portfolio-generator.description: Open-source tool that generates professional developer portfolios from GitHub data and resume information.
highlights: Open-sourced tool with 250+ GitHub stars
Automated portfolio generation from GitHub profile
Responsive templates with dark/light mode
Community-driven with 12+ contributors

e-commerce-platform.title: E-Commerce Platform
e-commerce-platform.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and analytics dashboard for local business client.
highlights: Built complete e-commerce solution from scratch
Integrated Stripe payment processing with 99.9% uptime
Implemented real-time inventory tracking system
Created comprehensive analytics dashboard

restaurant-management.title: Restaurant Management System
restaurant-management.description: Comprehensive system for restaurant operations including POS, inventory, staff management, and customer analytics for chain of restaurants.
highlights: Deployed across 5 restaurant locations
Handles 10,000+ daily transactions
Reduced operational time by 40%
Real-time inventory and analytics dashboard
